GenericVisitTask.name: GenericVisitTask
GenericVisitTask.description: Represents information about a task that can be performed during a visit.

DefinitionReferenceId.description: The definition record associated with the runtime record. The value is null when the definition record is created.

EndDateTime.description: The end date and time of the visit task.

IsDefinition.description: Indicates whether the record is a definition record.

IsRequired.description: Indicates whether a task must be completed to complete a visit.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: Name of the generic visit task.

OwnerId.description: ID of the generic visit task record owner.

Sequence.description: The sequence in which the visit task can be performed.

StartDateTime.description: The start date and time of the visit task.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the generic visit task.

StatusCode.description: Specifies the status code of the generic visit task.

VisitId.description: The visit associated with the record.
